Package data

Class DatosTickets

java.lang.Object
data.DatosTickets
public final class DatosTickets extends Object
Class for the Application Data Management, to open and save Cinema Tickets files, and also for loading and saving user settings.
Since:
1.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    DatosTickets.OperationResult
    Enum constants to specify the result of an open or save operation

    final HashMap<String,Ticket>
    openTicketsFile()
    Manages the opening of a Cinema Tickets file, it shows an open file dialog and calls the proper method based on the determined file type, either text or binary to read the file in the right way and show its content
    final void
    saveTicketsFile(HashMap<String,Ticket> tickets)
    Manages the saving of a Cinema Tickets file, it shows a save file dialog and calls the proper method based on the file type specified in user settings/properties, either text or binary type to save the file following that setting
    final void

    Verifies if a user setting has ben changed compared with the saved user setting stored in the respective Properties object

    Sets the user settings changed indicator
    static void
    updateSaveOpenDlg()
    Updates the Open and Save file dialog, this method is mostly used when a Look and Feel is set, to properly update the JFileChooser to match with the current theme
    final void
    userSettingsLoader()
    Loads user settings only if User Settings file exists
    final void
    userSettingsSaver()
    Saves user settings only if User Settings have changed, using a boolean helper attribute
    final void
    userSettingsVerifier()
    Verifies user settings, if User Settings file doesn't exist yet, it is created just as a copy with same values as default settings

  • Method Details

    • getDatosTickets

      public static DatosTickets getDatosTickets()
      Gets the unique instance of this class, following Singleton Desing Pattern in Development
      Returns:
      The Unique DatosTickets instance

    • saveTicketsFile

      public final void saveTicketsFile(HashMap<String,Ticket> tickets)
      Manages the saving of a Cinema Tickets file, it shows a save file dialog and calls the proper method based on the file type specified in user settings/properties, either text or binary type to save the file following that setting
      Parameters:
      tickets - A HashMap<String, Ticket> collection which contains the current tickets to save in a Cinema Tickets file
      Since:
      1.6
      See Also:
      • Ticket

    • openTicketsFile

      public final HashMap<String,Ticket> openTicketsFile()
      Manages the opening of a Cinema Tickets file, it shows an open file dialog and calls the proper method based on the determined file type, either text or binary to read the file in the right way and show its content
      Returns:
      A HashMap<String, Ticket> collection which contains the opened read tickets from a Cinema Tickets file
      Since:
      1.6

    • dialogDirectorySetter

      public final void dialogDirectorySetter()
      Sets the save or open dialog starting folder following the user settings
      Since:
      1.6
      See Also:
      • AdmSettings

    • defaultSettingsVerifier

      public final void defaultSettingsVerifier()
      Verifies settings by default, if Default Settings file doesn't exist yet, it is created with generic starting values
      Since:
      1.4

    • userSettingsVerifier

      public final void userSettingsVerifier()
      Verifies user settings, if User Settings file doesn't exist yet, it is created just as a copy with same values as default settings
      Since:
      1.4

    • userSettingsLoader

      public final void userSettingsLoader()
      Loads user settings only if User Settings file exists
      Since:
      1.4
      See Also:
      • AdmSettings

    • userSettingsSaver

      public final void userSettingsSaver()
      Saves user settings only if User Settings have changed, using a boolean helper attribute
      Since:
      1.4

    • settingsChangeVerifier

      public final void settingsChangeVerifier()
      Verifies if a user setting has ben changed compared with the saved user setting stored in the respective Properties object
      Since:
      1.4
      See Also:
      • DatosTickets

    • updateSaveOpenDlg

      public static void updateSaveOpenDlg()
      Updates the Open and Save file dialog, this method is mostly used when a Look and Feel is set, to properly update the JFileChooser to match with the current theme
      Since:
      1.4

      Gets the result of a open or save operation

      public boolean isUserSettingsChanged()
      Gets the user settings changed indicator
      Returns:
      true if a user setting has changed, false otherwise
      Since:
      1.4

    • setUserSettingsChanged

      public void setUserSettingsChanged(boolean userSettingsChanged)
      Sets the user settings changed indicator
      Parameters:
      userSettingsChanged - A boolean that indicates the change of a user setting, it should be true if a setting has changed and false if not
      Since:
      1.4
